      • sumAmmoBag

        public static AmmoBag sumAmmoBag(AmmoBag first,
                                 AmmoBag second)
        Sum the number of ammo of two ammo bag. Sum the ammo according to their color, red with red, blue with blue etc.
        Parameters:
        first - The first ammo bag to sum
        second - The second ammo bag to sum
        Returns:
        A new ammo bag with the sum of the color

        String the full ammo bag, representing each attributes with symbol and color. Work with UTF-8 and ANSI code

        The representation of the ammo bag
